TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XsdDataContractExporter extends System.Object

summary.span: Allows the transformation of a set of .NET Framework types that are used in data contracts into an XML schema file (.xsd).

span.span: Allows the transformation of a set of .NET Framework types that are used in data contracts into an XML schema file (.xsd).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在已创建的 Web 服务包含由公共语言运行库 (CLR) 类型表示的数据时，以及在需要为其他 Web 服务将使用的每个类型导出 XML 架构时，请使用 类。Use the class when you have created a Web service that incorporates data represented by common language runtime (CLR) types and when you need to export XML schemas for each type to be consumed by other Web services. 也就是说， 能够将一组 CLR 类型转换成 XML 架构。That is, transforms a set of CLR types into XML schemas. (有关可以使用的类型的详细信息，请参阅[类型支持的数据协定序列化程序](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md)。)然后，可以通过 Web Services 描述语言 (WSDL) 文档公开这些架构，以便需要与你的服务交互操作的其他用户使用。(For more information about the types that can be used, see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md).) The schemas can then be exposed through a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document for use by others who need to interoperate with your service. 反之，如果您要创建的 Web 服务必须与现有 Web 服务交互操作，请使用 转换 XML 架构，并且创建用所选编程语言表示数据的 CLR 类型。Conversely, if you are creating a Web service that must interoperate with an existing Web service, use the to transform XML schemas and create the CLR types that represent the data in a selected programming language. 生成一个包含架构集合的 对象。The generates an object that contains the collection of schemas. 通过 属性访问架构集。Access the set of schemas through the property. > [!NOTE] > 若要快速生成其他 Web 服务可以使用的 XML 架构定义 (XSD) 文件，请使用 。To quickly generate XML schema definition (XSD) files that other Web services can consume, use the . ## 将架构导出到 XmlSchemaSet 中Exporting Schemas Into an XmlSchemaSet 若要创建 类的包含 XML 架构文件的实例，应该注意以下问题。To create an instance of the class that contains XML schema files, you should be aware of the following. 您要导出的类型集将被记录为一组内部数据协定。The set of types you are exporting are recorded as an internal set of data contracts. 因此，可以多次调用 方法向架构集中添加新类型，并且不会降低性能（这是因为仅将新类型添加到架构集中）。Thus, you can call the method multiple times to add new types to the schema set without degrading performance because only the new types will be added to the set. 在执行 操作期间，会将现有架构与要添加的新架构进行比较。During the operation, the existing schemas are compared to the new schemas being added. 如果有冲突，则会引发异常。If there are conflicts, an exception will be thrown. 如果两种类型具有相同的数据协定名称，但具有不同的协定（不同的成员），那么当这两种类型由同一 实例导出时，通常会检测到冲突。A conflict is usually detected if two types with the same data contract name but different contracts (different members) are exported by the same instance. ## 使用导出程序Using the Exporter 建议按以下方法使用此类：A recommended way of using this class is as follows: 1. 使用 重载之一来确定是否可以导出指定的类型和类型集。Use one of the overloads to determine whether the specified type or set of types can be exported. 请使用符合您要求的重载之一。Use one of the overloads that is appropriate to your requirements. 2. 调用对应的 方法。Call the corresponding method. 3. 从 属性检索架构。Retrieve the schemas from the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建了一个 实例并调用 方法。The following example creates an instance of the and calls the method. [!code-csharp[XsdDataContractExporter#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/xsddatacontractexporter/cs/overview.cs#0)] [!code-vb[XsdDataContractExporter#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/xsddatacontractexporter/vb/overview.vb#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您已有一个要向其添加新架构的 时，请使用此重载。Use this overload when you have an existing to which you want to add new schemas. 在使用此重载构造 后，请调用 方法将新类型添加到现有架构集中。After you construct a with this overload, call the method to add new types to the existing set.

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a common language runtime (CLR) type (or set of types) can be exported.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a common language runtime (CLR) type (or set of types) can be exported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并非所有 CLR 类型都可在数据协定中使用。Not all CLR types can be used in data contracts. 有关什么可以序列化的详细信息，请参阅[类型支持的数据协定序列化程序](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md)。For more information about what can be serialized, see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/types-supported-by-the-data-contract-serializer.md).

summary.span: Transforms the common language runtime (CLR) type, or set of types, into a set of XML schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议使用 重载之一来确定是否可以导出指定的类型或类型集。As a recommended practice, use one of the overloads to determine whether the specified type or set of types can be exported. 调用 方法后，从 属性检索架构。After calling the method, retrieve the schemas from the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要用于表示 XML 架构中的匿名类型。The main purpose of this method is to allow anonymous types in XML schema to be represented. 匿名类型不具有协定名称和命名空间，所以不能使用 对它们进行查找。Because anonymous types do not have a contract name and namespace, they cannot be looked up using the . 此方法返回此类类型的 定义。This method returns the definition for such types. 方法为其返回有效名称的类型，此方法返回 `null`。The types for which the method returns a valid name, this method returns `null`.

span.span: The argument is .
